title: Paradise Herbs, AYUR-Pro Rx, Calm, 60 Vegetarian Capsules
cleaned_text: Herbs, AYUR-Pro Rx, Calm, 60 Vegetarian Capsules - Date First Available: June 2020 - Shipping Weight: 0.07 kg - Product Code: PAR-77877 - UPC Code: 601944778774 - Package Quantity: 60 Count - Dimensions: 10.4 x 5.8 x 6.1 cm , 0.05 rank: [Calm Formulas](/c/calm-formulas?sr=2)> [Herbal Formulas](/c/herbal-formulas?sr=2)> [Brain & Cognitive](/c/brain-cognitive?sr=2)> Product overview Description - Premium Quality - Dr. Formulated - Ayurvedic Extract - Mind & Body Formula - Super Potency - Bacopa + Holy Basil + Lotus Seed - Vegan - Made with Non-GMO Ingredients - Gluten Free - Dietary Supplement - Whole Spectrum Action Synergized Formula - GMP Quality Assured & FDA Registered - Enhancing Nature's Miracles Since 1994 Ayurveda - The Science of Life Ayurveda has been in existence for about 5,000 years. Along with Traditional Chinese herbalism is one of the oldest forms of natural medicine. Ayurveda is a complex art using a holistic approach that takes in the entire person and focuses on the root of imbalance rather than just the mere symptoms. Quality - Purity - Potency Paradise products have won over a decade of Best of Supplements Awards. We are dedicated to sourcing premium ultra pure ingredients that meet the highest standards of excellence. No Unnecessary Fillers Unlike tablets that contain binders, fillers, magnesium stearate for stearic acid (which may inhibit absorption), our vegetarian capsules dissolve quickly in the digestive tract. We don't add unnecessary fillers, binders, stearates, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives to our encapsulations. Ayur-Pro RX Paradise Ayur-Pro RX products are formulated by real Ayurvedic practitioners. The focus is on clean, pure & proper souring while combining these ayurvedic herbal extract for maximum synergy, efficacy, safety, purity and potency. Calm - Anxiety Formula According to Ayurveda, too much though with anxiety, stress and worry can make like extremely unpleasant. Our premium quality Ayurvedic Calm formula contains super potent extracts of Bacopa and Holy Basil to bring you the most active and nurturing Paradise calming the mind and body formula available. Suggested use Take 2 vegetarian capsules preferably one hour before bed or as directed by your qualified health care professional. Other ingredients Vegetarian capsule (plant cellulose). Contains no common allergens. Made without fillers. Warnings Keep in a cool dry place, out of the reach of children. If pregnant, nursing, or using any prescription medication consult your health care professional before using this product.
